SEARCH
Package com.lowagie.text.pdf.internal

Class PolylineShape

java.lang.Object
com.lowagie.text.pdf.internal.PolylineShape
All Implemented Interfaces:
Shape
public class PolylineShape extends Object implements Shape
Class that defines a Polyline shape. This class was originally written by wil - amristar.com.au and integrated into iText by Bruno.

    • PolylineShape

      public PolylineShape(int[] x, int[] y, int nPoints)
      Creates a PolylineShape.
      Parameters:
      x - An int array containing all the X-values of the coordinates in the polyline
      y - An int array containing all the Y-values of the coordinates in the polyline
      nPoints - The total number of points
